I first worked with James when I rented a full camera and grip package for an independent feature film being shot here in Phoenix.  He was very helpful and got us the best quality gear our budget could allow.  Over the next year and a half, I had rented other gear from him and every time he is on top of his game and gets me what I need to get the job done right.  I look forward to working with him again when I have future projects.

Jayson Crothers
Director of Photography
July 16, 2009, Jayson was a client of James’

Over the course of my career thus far, I've enjoyed working all across the US as well as out of the country.  I've spent a fair amount of time interacting with rental companies from NY to LA to Peru, ranging from small productions with modest equipment needs, to outfitting multiple units with enormous equipment requirements.  With all of that said, working with James and MP&E was amongst one of the finest experiences I've ever had.  James supported all of our equipment needs for my first Red feature and did so with 24/7 support, extensive knowledge and advice, and a keen eye to our limited budget.  James gave truth to the cliche of "making the impossible, possible" - no matter what we needed, he somehow made it possible and did so with the utmost patience and a never-ending smile.  Working with him was a pleasure and one of those rare joys when you discover that your "equipment provider" is actually a member of your creative production team.  My only regret is that James and his company are based out of Arizona, so I don't get to work with him on EVERY production.  I cannot recommend James or his company highly enough.
Jayson Crothers

summary: In a world where loyalty is just about dead I'm still a firm believer that business is about relationships.  I am fanatical about creating moving images and will be as driven as you are in what it takes to deliver your story.
